doc:
Steve Shaw (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Shaw_(actor) 0 Steve Shaw (June 3, 1965 in St. Louis, Missouri – December 5, 1990) was an American actor best known for playing Eric Fairgate in the television drama Knots Landing. One of his earliest acting appearances was "Little House On The Prairie" Season 3 Episode 22, Gold Country, as Sam Delano, the son of an Italian couple mining for gold. He appeared again in Season 5 episode of Little House on the Prairie entitled "The Odyssey" in which he played a character named Dylan Whittaker who has been diagnosed with terminal leukemia and wishes to see the Pacific Ocean before he dies. He also appeared in two episodes of The Waltons as George Simmons. Shaw appeared regularly in Knots Landing from 1979 to 1987, and thereafter made occasional return appearances before his death in a traffic accident on December 5, 1990, in Los Angeles. Steve_Shaw ( June_3_,_1965 in St._Louis , Missouri – December_5_,_1990 ) was an_American_actor best_known for playing Eric_Fairgate in the_television_drama_Knots_Landing . One of his_earliest_acting_appearances was " Little_House On The_Prairie_"_Season_3_Episode_22 , Gold_Country , as Sam_Delano , the_son of an_Italian_couple_mining for gold . He appeared again in Season_5_episode of Little_House on the_Prairie entitled " The_Odyssey " in which he played a_character named Dylan_Whittaker who has_been_diagnosed with terminal_leukemia and wishes_to_see the_Pacific_Ocean before he dies . He also appeared in two_episodes of The_Waltons as George_Simmons . Shaw appeared regularly in Knots_Landing from 1979 to 1987 , and thereafter_made occasional_return_appearances before his_death in a_traffic_accident on December_5_,_1990 , in Los_Angeles .
